com.atakmap.android.maps.hittest

Class RootHitTestQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.hittest.RootHitTestQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeepHitTestQuery

    public class RootHitTestQuery
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeepHitTestQuery
    An implementation of DeepHitTestQuery that utilizes HitTestControl and other DeepHitTestQuery sub-queries within a GL event.

      • deepHitTest

        public final java.util.SortedSet<MapItem> deepHitTest(MapView mapView,
                                                      HitTestQueryParameters params)
        Description copied from interface: DeepHitTestQuery
        Perform a hit-test given a set of query parameters NOTE: This is called on the GL thread
        Specified by:
        deepHitTest in interface DeepHitTestQuery
        Parameters:
        mapView - Map view instance
        params - Hit-test query parameters (location of hit, bounds, etc.)
        Returns:
        Hit map items or null if none hit

      • deepHitTest

        public final java.util.SortedSet<MapItem> deepHitTest(MapView mapView,
                                                      HitTestQueryParameters params,
                                                      java.util.Collection<? extends DeepHitTestQuery> subQueries)
        Perform a deep hit test for map items with optional sub-queries
        Parameters:
        mapView - Map view
        params - Hit test query parameters
        subQueries - Additional hit test queries to run within the renderer thread
        Returns:
        List of hit map items sorted by z-order
